statement.p: In the figure below, the angles that appear to be right angles are in fact right angles. Lengths in the figure are given in units of meters.

Image DescriptionA closed shape with five straight sides, with its interior shaded, where four of its five sides are either horizontal or vertical. Beginning at the top right corner and moving to the left, the path around the shape starts with a side that is labeled 13 meters, then moving straight down, a side is labeled 8 meters, then moving diagonally down and right, a side is labeled 10 meters, then moving to the right, a side is labeled 7 meters, and finally moving straight up, a side is unlabeled, connecting back to the original starting point at top right.
What is the area of the shaded shape? Give your answer as a decimal number, and then choose the correct units from the dropdown menu.
